name: Glindra - File handling and ASCII tools
short_description: OpenVMS-inspired "dir", "copy", "purge" commands that support file version numbers. "dir -resolution" makes summaries of disk usage. "rename -lower -portable" cleans up filenames. grep-like "search". "filter" maps characters, trims blanks,
